item.title: Intro to Actor Model
item.description: If you’re here, it means that probably you’ve come across functional programming or Clojure. If not, perhaps I need to check my SEO. Anyway, let’s make the most out of it. Throughout the blog, I’ll try to simplify and present my understanding of the Functional Programming and Clojure. When you’re getting started with Clojure, the book Brave Clojure is going to be your life saver. Joy of Clojure is another book you’d find handy.
